thread.title: Arby's offers to cater Spurrier's retirement party
thread.title_full: Arby's offers to cater Spurrier's retirement party

author: Matt Hladik
title: Arby's offers to cater Spurrier's retirement party
text:
Arby's offers to cater Spurrier's retirement party College Spun 4 hrs ago Matt Hladik © USA TODAY Sports Jul 15, 2014; Hoover, AL, USA; South Carolina Gamecocks head coach Steve Spurrier talks to the media during the SEC Football Media Days at the Wynfrey Hotel. Mandatory Credit: Marvin Gentry-USA TODAY Sports It has been well-documented here at College Spun that Steve Spurrier loves his Arby’s . Well, when news broke this evening that the Head Ball Coach was retiring, effective immediately , Arby’s returned the love on Twitter in incredible fashion.
AdChoices
Hey @SC_HBC , let us know the date for the retirement party. We can bring sandwiches. pic.twitter.com/mxfghiz6zv
— Arby's (@Arbys) October 13, 2015
That is tremendous. Now that Spurrier is retired, he has more time to visit Arby’s. Who knows, maybe there is a spokesman deal in his future?
